img.title: Homepage – NCHS
img.rs-layer: WE AREN'T A TYPICAL HIGH SCHOOL

div.p: Northside Charter High School is a public charter school located in the North Williamsburg neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York, and provides scholars in grades 9-12 with an education that results in mastery of the New York State Learning Standards, high school graduation, and acceptance to colleges and universities of choice by all students.
Please join us every Friday at 6pm via Zoom for our Family & Caregiver Webinars!

div.class: wpb_video_widget wpb_content_element vc_clearfix vc_video-aspect-ratio-169 vc_video-el-width-100 vc_video-align-left

div.div:
High Standards
Students complete a college-readiness curriculum to prepare for college and beyond ...

Latin is Required
Latin is the required language to fulfill the LOTE regents diploma requirement. ...

div.p: Theater Arts, Chorus, Anime Club, Comic Book Club, and many more ...
We offers AP Bio, AP Calculus, AP English Literature & Language, Global ...

div.div:
Athletics
Baseball, Softball, Boys/Girls Basketball, Boys/ Girls Soccer ...
